Class HDOMUtil

java.lang.Object

public class HDOMUtil
extends java.lang.Object

This is a collection of utility methods on the Document Object Model document

Parameters:

Returns:
java.lang.String

textForFirstTag

public static java.lang.String textForFirstTag(Element element,
                                               java.lang.String tag)
This will look at the children of the element that have a tag name passed. It will then look at the child text nodes and return a trim'ed version of the first Text node as the text of the tag. For example given the XML source: Bill E. Bob "Bill E. Bob" = textForFirstTag(element, "person");

Parameters:
element - org.w3c.dom.Element
tag - java.lang.String
Returns:
java.lang.String

textForTag

public static java.lang.String[] textForTag(Element element,
                                            java.lang.String tag)
This will look at the children of the element that have a tag name passed. It will then look at the child text nodes and return a trim'ed version of each Text node as the text of the tag. For example given the XML source: Bill E. Bob Ralph Kramden String[] list = textForTag(element, "person"); list[0] = "Bill E. Bob" list[1] = "Ralph\nKramden"

Parameters:
element - org.w3c.dom.Element
tag - java.lang.String
Returns:
java.lang.String

trim

public static java.lang.String trim(Text textNode)
This will trim trailing and leading white space from a Text node in a DOM structure.

Parameters:
textNode - org.w3c.dom.Text
Returns:
java.lang.String
